title: Group portrait of wedding party, including groom Joseph W. Daniels, best man William Jackson, John H. Adams, Arthur Perkins Jr., Burl J. Moone III, Eugene Barkley, bride Jeanne Yvonne Adams Daniels wearing long sleeved gown with full skirt, Mable Adams, Sadie E. Harris, Edythe Smith Perkins, Evelyn Donald, Aldora Sanders, flower girl Laura Gale Adams, and ring bearer Cornelius Harris III, posed in Grace Memorial Presbyterian Church, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
